lead_paragraph: The once-troubled community of Tangelo Park has become an education success story with the financial backing of a hotel executive who grew up in Manhattan.

headline.print_headline: One Man’s Millions Turn a Community in Florida Around
headline.main: One Man’s Millions Turn a Community in Florida Around

snippet: The once-troubled community of Tangelo Park has become an education success story with the financial backing of a hotel executive who grew up in Manhattan.
abstract: Tangelo Park, Fla, has undergone major transformation over past two decades due to financial backing of Harris Rosen, successful hotel executive who grew up poor in Manhattan; crime has plummeted, nearly all of its seniors graduate from high school, and most go on to college on full scholarships that Rosen finances.
